${modID}:CheeseBoardBoss.NAME: Cheese Board
${modID}:CheeseBoardBoss.FLAVOR: Includes a wine glass to put a potion in! The meal complements your potions perfectly.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup gain #b1 Potion Slot. NL All hallway fights now give a bonus potion reward, even special rarity ones. NL #yPotions are #b20% stronger, with their potency increasing by at least #b1 [REMOVE_SPACE]. NL #yPotions grant #b1 Max HP on use.

Upon pickup gain #b1 Potion Slot. NL All hallway fights now give a bonus potion reward, even special rarity ones. NL #yPotions are #b20% stronger, with their potency increasing by at least #b1 [REMOVE_SPACE]. NL #yPotions grant #b1 Max HP on use.  NL #ySynergy: #y${modID}:Mageblood_Cheese [REMOVE_SPACE].

${modID}:AncientMeteoriteBoss.NAME: Ancient Meteorite
${modID}:AncientMeteoriteBoss.FLAVOR: Food for a giant green dragon, not for you!
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, raise your maximum hand size by #b1 [REMOVE_SPACE]. NL At the start of your turn, lose [E] and draw #b5 cards.

${modID}:DefreshPotionBoss.NAME: Defresh Potion
${modID}:DefreshPotionBoss.FLAVOR: As you drink from the potion you feel your memory begin to fade... It never returns...
DESCRIPTIONS: #ybundlecore:Rare NL Upon pickup, raise your maximum hand size by #b2 [REMOVE_SPACE]. NL At the start of your turn, gain [E] [REMOVE_SPACE][E] and draw #b3 cards. NL #rALL #rCARDS #yEXHAUST [REMOVE_SPACE].

${modID}:CurseOfThePeglinKingBoss.NAME: Curse of the Peglin King
${modID}:CurseOfThePeglinKingBoss.FLAVOR: Half of the time you feel full of energy, half of the time you feel slow. This odd artifact also has a slot in the back for a night cap.
DESCRIPTIONS: #y${modID}:Rare [REMOVE_SPACE]. NL Upon pickup, gain #b1 Potion Slot. NL At the start of your turn, add a #yMiracle to the top of your draw pile.

${modID}:PhoCommon.NAME: Pho
${modID}:PhoCommon.FLAVOR: A very spicy and meaty eat that is great for getting over bumps and bruises.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, gain #b3 Max HP. NL At the start of your turn, gain #b1 #y${modID}:Fire_Breathing [REMOVE_SPACE].

${modID}:PumpkinPieBoss.NAME: Pumpkin Pie
${modID}:PumpkinPieBoss.FLAVOR: It tastes so great, but can only fill you up for a disappointingly short period of time.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, gain #b6 Max HP and raise your maximum hand size by #b2 [REMOVE_SPACE]. NL At the start of combat, gain [E] [REMOVE_SPACE][E] [REMOVE_SPACE][E] and draw #b5 cards.

${modID}:ManaCloakRare.NAME: Mana Cloak
${modID}:ManaCloakRare.FLAVOR: A refreshing cloak that can help extract the hidden potential of your draughts.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you use a potion, gain [E] [REMOVE_SPACE]. NL If you have a potion and take unblocked attack damage, deal #b5 damage to ALL enemies and apply #b1 #yWeak to them.

${modID}:MagmaSkullBoss.NAME: Magma Skull
${modID}:MagmaSkullBoss.FLAVOR: Overflowing with real lava, try putting it in those empty potion bottles!
DESCRIPTIONS: #y${modID}:Rare [REMOVE_SPACE]. NL Upon pickup, gain #b2 potion slots. NL When you use a potion that isn't a #y${modID}:Lava_Potion [REMOVE_SPACE], gain a #yLava #yPotion [REMOVE_SPACE]. NL #yElite fights drop two extra potions.

#y${modID}:Rare [REMOVE_SPACE]. NL Upon pickup, gain #b2 potion slots. NL When you use a potion that isn't a #y${modID}:Lava_Potion [REMOVE_SPACE], gain a #yLava #yPotion [REMOVE_SPACE]. NL #yElite fights drop two extra potions. NL #ySynergy: #y${modID}:Mageblood_Lava [REMOVE_SPACE].

${modID}:RedRoyalGelBoss.NAME: Red Royal Gel
${modID}:RedRoyalGelBoss.FLAVOR: The collective congealment of two slime kings, this potent gel crown will keep slimes in check.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, #yChannel #b3 #y${modID}:Slimes [REMOVE_SPACE].

${modID}:ChimericGemstoneBoss.NAME: Philosuppliers Stone
${modID}:ChimericGemstoneBoss.FLAVOR: A truly energetic and radiant artefact that helps you outmaneuver your enemies!
DESCRIPTIONS: #gALL cards gain #y${modID}:Supplier [REMOVE_SPACE]. NL At the start of combat, gain [E] [REMOVE_SPACE]. NL At the start of turn #b2 and onwards, #rlose [E] and increase this loss by #b1 [REMOVE_SPACE].
bundlecore:Ambitious_Autumn

${modID}:EmeraldFeastBoss.NAME: Emerald Feast
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain [E] [REMOVE_SPACE][E] [REMOVE_SPACE]. NL At the start of combat, ALL enemies gain #b3 #yStrength [REMOVE_SPACE], #yPlated #yArmor and #b16 #yBlock [REMOVE_SPACE].
bundlecore:Champion_of_Donu

${modID}:DeliciousDecaBoss.NAME: Delicious Deca
${modID}:DeliciousDecaBoss.FLAVOR: A forsaken treat that Deca created by putting concrete sprinkles ontop of a donut... Probably not safe to eat, but you will try anyway.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, lose #r1 Max HP. NL At the start of your turn, gain [E] but ALL enemies gain #b2 #yPlated #yArmor [REMOVE_SPACE]. NL #y${modID}:Quest - #pDeca #p${modID}:Destiny [REMOVE_SPACE]. NL #y${modID}:Keybane - #rWound [REMOVE_SPACE].
bundlecore:Defeated_Donu

${modID}:AwakeningWheelBoss.NAME: Awakening Wheel
${modID}:AwakeningWheelBoss.FLAVOR: Collected feathers apparently from the crow god Mazaleth, it being haphazardly slewn around the spire does not bode well.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play a #yPower card gain #b2 #yStrength [REMOVE_SPACE]. NL After playing #b13 powers that cost #b1 or more in one combat, gain #yTruest #yPower [REMOVE_SPACE].
bundlecore:Champion_of_Deca

${modID}:MenacingRavenBoss.NAME: Crow's Calling
${modID}:MenacingRavenBoss.FLAVOR: A token used to access the secret floor of the spire, apparently the cultists have succeeded in reincarnating their crow god, Mazaleth, you should investigate.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, obtain all key pieces. NL Gain [E] at the start of your turn and draw #1 additional card. NL #y${modID}:Quest - #rMazaleth #p${modID}:Destiny [REMOVE_SPACE]. NL #y${modID}:Keybane - #rVoid NL #y${modID}:Keybane - #rVoid [REMOVE_SPACE].
bundlecore:Defeated_Deca

${modID}:UpdateBoss.NAME: Card Update
${modID}:UpdateBoss.FLAVOR: Hello this flavour text panel has been trying to reach you about your mod's extended update schedule...
DESCRIPTIONS: Permanently apply a special upgrade, #ybundlecore:MK2 [REMOVE_SPACE], to #gALL non #rStatus [REMOVE_SPACE], non #pCurse cards.
bundlecore:Ambitious_Autumn

${modID}:TemporalTimepieceBoss.NAME: Temporal Timepiece
${modID}:TemporalTimepieceBoss.FLAVOR: The potion seller has reported that thieves have been using time distorting watches to rob her stashes, it seems this one was left behind...
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat gain #rTime #rWarp [REMOVE_SPACE]. NL At the end of your turn, gain [E] [REMOVE_SPACE][E] next turn. NL #y${modID}:Quest - #pTime #pEater #p${modID}:Destiny [REMOVE_SPACE]. NL #y${modID}:Keybane - #rDazed [REMOVE_SPACE].
bundlecore:Defeated_Donu

${modID}:CursedBrandBoss.NAME: Brand of the Collector
${modID}:CursedBrandBoss.FLAVOR: The collector is rumoured to be the buyer of the stolen potion schematics, with this brand you can find her hideout...
DESCRIPTIONS: Before the start of combat, gain #b1 #yWeak [REMOVE_SPACE], #yVulnerable and #yFrail [REMOVE_SPACE]. NL At the start of your turn, gain [E] [REMOVE_SPACE]. NL Boss fights contain a dangerous #rBrazier [REMOVE_SPACE]. NL #y${modID}:Quest - #pCollector #p${modID}:Destiny [REMOVE_SPACE]. NL #y${modID}:Keybane - #rBurn [REMOVE_SPACE].
bundlecore:Defeated_Time

${modID}:StimulantRShop.NAME: Stimulant R
${modID}:StimulantRShop.FLAVOR: Used by the Thieves guild to make a quick getaway, those without protective enchantments will become insane upon consumption
DESCRIPTIONS: When you drink a potion, enter #yWrath [REMOVE_SPACE]. NL #ySynergy: #y${modID}:Mageblood_Stimulant_R [REMOVE_SPACE].
bundlecore:Defeated_Time

${modID}:BrewcyclerRare.NAME: Brewcycler
${modID}:BrewcyclerRare.FLAVOR: Ever wondered whats inside the box? Looks like someone has been using it to blend potions, why don't you try it?
DESCRIPTIONS: The first #b2 times you discard a potion each combat, add a random potion of the same rarity to the rewards. NL Occasionally produces something #pOdd [REMOVE_SPACE].

${modID}:RadiantCircletEvent.NAME: Radiant Circlet
${modID}:RadiantCircletEvent.FLAVOR: You can unlock more quest relics by completing existing quests, most quests are tied to specific bundles.
DESCRIPTIONS: There are no quest relics available or you have one already. NL At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card.

${modID}:SingularityBoss.NAME: Singularity
DESCRIPTIONS: #ybundlecore:Rare NL Cards are #b65% stronger, which can round up, but #rExhaust [REMOVE_SPACE].

${modID}:DualityDraughtRare.NAME: Draught of Duality
${modID}:DualityDraughtRare.FLAVOR: Greater than the sum of its parts.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b10 times you play a card with a #ybundlecore:Cardmod [REMOVE_SPACE], draw #b1 card and gain [E] [REMOVE_SPACE].

${modID}:ModificationKitCommon.NAME: Modification Kit
${modID}:ModificationKitCommon.FLAVOR: With the correct tools, no job is too tough for a spire climber!
DESCRIPTIONS: #yAttack cards with a #ybundlecore:Cardmod have #b1 more damage. NL After playing a #ySkill with a #ybundlecore:Cardmod gain #b1 #yBlock [REMOVE_SPACE].

${modID}:JarOfMarmaladeShop.NAME: Pot of Marmalade Tea
${modID}:JarOfMarmaladeShop.FLAVOR: Sweet yet astringent, it can take a while to get past the strong taste.
DESCRIPTIONS: Heal #b6 HP and gain #b1 Max HP on pickup. NL At the start of your turn, a random card in hand is #rForced to gain #ybundlecore:Supplier [REMOVE_SPACE].

${modID}:BottledModsUncommon.NAME: Concentrated Bottled Force
${modID}:BottledModsUncommon.FLAVOR: A bottle filled with distilled force brew, it seems to have a more reliable effect... thankfully...

Dark Core.NAME: Dark Core
DESCRIPTIONS: When you channel any #yOrb it will become a #yDark instead.

${modID}:FanMailCommon.NAME: Fan Mail

${modID}:CursedMirrorRare.NAME: Cursed Mirror
${modID}:CursedMirrorRare.FLAVOR: I can see the better half of... me?

${modID}:BifurkiteBoss.FLAVOR: This is getting out of hand, now there are two of them!
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you play a card with a #ybundlecore:Cardmod each turn, gain [E] [REMOVE_SPACE].

${modID}:ModSoupBoss.NAME: Mod Soup

DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain [E] and #rForce a card in your hand to become #rbundlecore:Soupy [REMOVE_SPACE].
